alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 3:19PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Gulf and southeastern Bay Counties through 400 PM EDT/300 PM CDT/... At 319 PM EDT/219 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Mexico Beach, or 14 miles southeast of Callaway, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Callaway, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, St Andrews State Park, Southport, Allanton, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, Beacon Beach, College Station, Bayou George, Camp Flowers, Overstreet, Biltmore Beach and Davis Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay
